details.title: Detailed Jenkins test report data
details.description: Harvest more detailed data about the tests done to a build.

preference.name: max
preference.label: Max queries
preference.description: Limit the max amount of queries to be made by the operator. If the input data is not filtered, there might be a large amount of requests.

inputendpoint.name: build
inputendpoint.label: Jenkins builds
inputendpoint.description: The jenkins builds to be analyzed

outputendpoint.name: test-data
outputendpoint.label: Test data
outputendpoint.description: Test data about the test done to the input build
